roleset.name: to suspect or doubt

example.name: distrust
example.text: They have mistrusted the Israelis throughout this process.

example.name: arg2
example.text: Besides the initial mistrust of " not believeing " they will not disrupt the parade , unless they are willing to sign a document stating they will honour the ones who gave the ultimate sacrifice , and give thanks to the ones who are currently fighting to ensure they " can have an opinion " and not in any way disrupt the parade .... then I would say no they can not join the parade .......
example.arg: of " not believeing " they will not disrupt the parade

example.name: all args
example.text: His dangerous grand schemes and war plans mirrored the desire for Athens to expand her influence and though his fellow citizens repeatedly voted him into high command, their mistrust of him for his private debaucheries and ambition would ultimately lead to the destruction of them both.
example.arg: for his private debaucheries and ambition

roleset.note: MISTRUST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'mistrust' based on ebn instances. frame by Perryn (from mistrust.01-v predicate notes)
MISTRUST-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, mistrust-v.01. No VNcls. (from mistrust.01-n)
